WRITING.TITLE: Views - What counts as one view?
WRITING.TEXT: I wondered as I couldn't find an explanation. When it states viewed: 'number' does this mean that many people viewed this page, opened one episode or opened all episodes?

WRITING.TITLE: One Piece movies - Should I (not seen any Onepiece) watch it?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm not watching the series but I'd like to watch a movie that screams onepiece. I heard an OST from the movie Gold and now I'm asking should I watch the movie if I'm totally unfamiliar with Onepiece? Or which movie should you recommend that's best for me? Or should I not watch any movie and start the series?

WRITING.TITLE: Best duel deck?
WRITING.TEXT: Looking for a Combo play vs Big Creature decks, they don't have to be one of the Magic clash/duel packs! but they have to be balanced against each other. (They may definitely be deeper to play!)

WRITING.TITLE: My favourite numbers are the same as the day of my birthday.
WRITING.TEXT: My birthday is on the 27th and my favourite numbers are 7 and 2. 21 years old and now I'm getting why they are. I have brainwashed my unconscious.

WRITING.TITLE: Why does kisscartoon has a cool loading screen but anime doesn't?
WRITING.TEXT: What lies beyond this secret? Why are we of those that do not deserve awesomeness?
